title: Consumer Price Index of all urban consumers , by region 2019
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984).
The highest category is found at West where Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) is 270.35.
The lowest category is found at Midwest where Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) is 237.78.
